sitelink_opportunities.recommendation: Unlikely to compete for sitelinks against marketplace platforms
sitelink_opportunities.rationale: Sitelinks favor large sites with clear category structure + high traffic
sitelink_opportunities.alternative_strategy: Focus on capturing PAA positions + featured snippets instead

local_pack_opportunity.rationale: 'pferd kaufen' is not local service query (buying horses, not finding stables)

marketplace_dominance.implication: Transactional intent dominates, informational content ranks elsewhere

pferdewert_positioning_strategy.direct_competition: Not feasible for this keyword (marketplace platforms have structural advantage)
alternative_approach: Target informational modifiers (e.g., 'pferd kaufen preis', 'pferd kaufen checkliste', 'pferd wert ermitteln')
Capture PAA positions with superior pricing content
Create comprehensive buying guide that surfaces for related queries
Focus on pre-purchase phase (valuation) vs. transaction phase (listings)
pferdewert_positioning_strategy.content_angle: Buyer Education + Valuation Service (complement marketplace platforms rather than compete)
pferdewert_positioning_strategy.cta_integration: After educating on pricing → 'Bewerten Sie Ihr Wunschpferd kostenlos' CTA

key_takeaways.serp_intent: Strongly transactional with significant pricing information need
key_takeaways.content_gaps: Zero informational content in top 10 despite 75% of PAA being price-focused
key_takeaways.user_pain_point: Price uncertainty + lack of objective valuation guidance
key_takeaways.pferdewert_opportunity: Become authoritative source for horse pricing education → capture PAA positions → funnel to valuation service
recommended_content_strategy: Create comprehensive 'Pferd kaufen Preis' guide targeting PAA questions
Develop valuation methodology explainer (transparency builds trust)
Publish regional pricing data (address location-specific searches)
Build 'Was kostet ein Pferd wirklich?' total cost of ownership content
Integrate valuation CTA after educational content
